mapper.sql: t.login as "login", t.name as "name", t.token_hash as "tokenHash", t.created_at as "createdAt"
mapper.insert: insert into user_tokens ( login, name, token_hash, created_at ) values ( #{login,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokenHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_tokens WHERE login=#{login} and name=#{name}
